member.name: T:MCWrapper.Extensions.MultiChainCoreServices
member.summary: Extension methods for adding both MCWrapper.CLI and MCWrapper.RPC client libraries to an application's service container.

member.name: M:MCWrapper.Extensions.MultiChainCoreServices.AddMultiChainCoreServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary:
Add both MCWrapper.CLI and MCWrapper.RPC client libraries to an application service container.
RpcOptions, CliOptions, and RuntimeParamOptions are parsed from the local environment variable store.

member.name: M:MCWrapper.Extensions.MultiChainCoreServices.AddMultiChainCoreServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary:
Add both MCWrapper.CLI and MCWrapper.RPC client libraries to an application service container.
RpcOptions, CliOptions, and RuntimeParamOptions are parsed from the local IConfiguration pipeline.

member.name: M:MCWrapper.Extensions.MultiChainCoreServices.AddMultiChainCoreServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{MCWrapper.RPC.Options.RpcOptions},System.Action{MCWrapper.CLI.Options.CliOptions},System.Action{MCWrapper.Ledger.Entities.Options.RuntimeParamOptions})
member.summary:
Add both MCWrapper.CLI and MCWrapper.RPC client libraries to an application service container.
RpcOptions, CliOptions, and RuntimeParamOptions are parsed from explicitily configured and passed Action parameters.

member.name: T:MCWrapper.Factory.MCWrapperClientFactory
member.summary: MCWrapper client factory produces instances of the RpcClientFactory and the CliClientFactory

member.name: P:MCWrapper.Factory.MCWrapperClientFactory.RpcClients
member.summary: GET: MCWrapper Remote Procedure Call (RPC) client factory

member.name: P:MCWrapper.Factory.MCWrapperClientFactory.CliClients
member.summary: GET: MCWrapper Command Line Interface (CLI) client factory
